cons: High in Cholesterol: 152 milligrams of cholesterol per 100 gram serving of prawns, just two servings would put you daily diet over the recommended allowance of 300 milligrams of cholesterol. Which may cause may cause heart diseases.
Toxic content: Prawns include some toxic content such as dioxins, PCBs, and other banned chemicals which are the major Disadvantages of eating prawns.
description: Prawns are rich source of Selenium which helps to prevent the growth of cancer cells in the body thus it helps in preventing cancers in the body.
Prawns are very rich source of calcium it is thus very good for teeth and bones.
Prawns are a rich source of Omega 3 Fatty acids which is very good for heart.
Prawns have very less calories as compared to most other meats and thus is very good for keeping the calorie count down and loose weight.
